name: The Big Mouth
description:
I made The Big Mouth as a submission for low effort jam 16. The game is bad and low-effort.

Features:

No pause cuz I'm lazy

Very bad animations

art made in Paint 3D

bugs I guess

How to play:

So basically, you need to save the kid from being crushed by the monster's teeth.

To stop it, you need to guess a number between 1 and 12 with 3 attempts.

If you don't guess it, the jaws will get 10 pixels closer.

If you guess it, you'll get 100 points and the jaws will be like at the start.

Controls:

ENTER to restart

Numbers: press the F key with the number like 4=F4, 8=F8 etc.

Programms used:

Python 3.9.2 (the programming language I used)

SFXR (sound effect generator)

Paint 3D (for art)
